definition: celestial horse (mythology)/fine horse/Ferghana horse/(western mythology) Pegasus
day/sky/heaven
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
like a heavenly steed, soaring across the skies (idiom)/(of writing, calligraphy etc) bold and imaginative/unconstrained in style

sentences.english: No one can stop the flight of the conceptual architects’ thought.
sentences.chinese: 誰也不能阻遏概念建築師的思想天馬行空。

sentences.english: It is located in the Sheshan Songjiang district, in the Western outskirts of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 天馬賽車場坐落於上海市西郊的松江區。

sentences.english: Media test drive has always been unconstrained woolgather.
sentences.chinese: 媒體試駕向來是天馬行空，獨往獨來。

sentences.english: Hypothetic , tml is the day to end, wat will you do.
sentences.chinese: 假設，天馬艦是一天結束，笏將你怎麼做。

sentences.english: What was once wild fantasy had become reality.
sentences.chinese: 這個一度天馬行空的幻想已然成爲事實。

sentences.english: I think the song named the Fantasy of Pegasus is very newby.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲那首《天馬的幻想》很牛逼。

sentences.english: This technology is demonstrated by experiments to be adaptable for the treatment of such kind ores and for the practical production of Tianmashan mine.
sentences.chinese: 此工藝比較適合天馬山礦石性質和該礦實際生產情況。

sentences.english: Ili does deserve to be called the name of heavenly horses.
sentences.chinese: 伊犁真不愧是天馬的故鄉。

sentences.english: Now, Tenma is also in the same city, lying low in the Turkish town.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，天馬也在同一個城市的土耳其鎮。

sentences.english: This is my unconstrained woolgather, some are true, some are false.
sentences.chinese: 天馬行空的胡思亂想，有真有假。

sentences.english: Do you know why the Ili Horse is called the Heavenly Horse?
sentences.chinese: 您知道伊犁馬爲什麼叫天馬嗎？

sentences.english: If tml is the doomsday of the world.
sentences.chinese: 如果天馬艦是世界末日的世界。

sentences.english: just being creative enough in my imagination.
sentences.chinese: 我的想象力還不夠天馬行空。

definition: spirited horse
Shuangta district of Chaoyang city 朝陽市|朝阳市, Liaoning

Azure Dragon, one of the four symbols of the Chinese constellations, also known as the Azure Dragon of the East 東方青龍|东方青龙[Dong1 fang1 Qing1 long2] or 東方蒼龍|东方苍龙[Dong1 fang1 Cang1 long2]/(slang) man without pubic hair
to communicate with the spirits/psychic/(ears) sensitive/(information) accurate
to cry (of birds, animals and insects)/to make a sound/to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)
(bird species of China) northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis)
flying Apsara (Buddhist art)
eagle/falcon/hawk
wyvern (type of dragon)
Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
lit. hidden dragon/fig. emperor in hiding
nickname of Zhuge Liang 諸葛亮|诸葛亮/Wolong giant panda nature reserve 臥龍大熊貓保護區|卧龙大熊猫保护区 in Wenchuan county, northwest Sichuan/Wolong district of Nanyang city 南陽|南阳[Nan2 yang2], Henan
eastern bean goose/great/large
pavilion with a view/high/tall/high fronted, curtained carriage (old)
surname Xuan
phoenix
surname Feng
Milky Way/our galaxy
to become civilized/to be open-minded/(of ice) to thaw
